title: Population growth in Mexico 2018
yAxis: Population growth compared to the previous year
summary: Overall Population growth compared to the previous year has decreased over the Year.
Population growth compared to the previous year is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, and finally slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Population growth compared to the previous year, about 1.5 was reported at Year 2008
Minimum Population growth compared to the previous year about 1.16 was reached at Year 2017
min_summary: In general Population growth compared to the previous year has fallen over the Year.
Population growth compared to the previous year is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, and finally slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2017.
